Class Agenda

  • java.lang.Object
    • Agenda

  • public class Agenda
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods to interact with the Person class

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Person[] agenda 
      static int l 
      static Person p1 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Agenda() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPerson(Person p)
      The addPerson method will add another Person to the Agenda person array
      void deletePerson(java.lang.String name)
      This method will delete a person from the agenda based on the person's name
      void editPerson(java.lang.String name, int updatePhone)
      This method will search for a person's name that is stored in the agenda array and use the second int parameter to update his phone number
      void editPerson(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String updateName)
      This method will search for a Contact's name that is stored in the agenda array and use the second String parameter to update his name.
      void findPerson(int phone)
      This method will perform a search in the agenda array based on an integer representing the person's phone number.
      void findPerson(java.lang.String searched)
      This method will perform a search in the agenda array based on a string that can correspond to either the person's name or email
      void listAgenda()
      This method will display the persons from the agenda array

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
